Description:
SunChips® multigrain snacks aren’t just any snack. They are the square, wavy, tasty, made with 100% whole grains that take snacking from ho hum to oh yeah. They are a snack that you feel good about sharing, but secretly wish you had all to yourself.

SunChips® multigrain snacks are an entirely different kind of snack and when you look closely, you can see it’s what’s inside those unique waves that make SunChips® one-of-a-kind. They are made with 100% whole grains with flavours inspired by fresh, real ingredients. Made with no artificial flavours, colours or preservatives!

At SunChips®, being different is kind of our thing and we like it that way. So wave goodbye to ordinary—and say hello to a wholesome snacking experience!

Where Wholesome Meets Awesome!
